players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I'm saddened by Bob's death. Who do you all think is the mafioso?"
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Diana: "Alice, that's a bold claim to make so early. If you're really the detective, why reveal yourself immediately and make yourself a target?"
Diana: "Alice could easily be the mafia trying to frame me. A real detective would be more careful about revealing themselves this early."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
